title: Service Category
description: Highest-level classification of a service based on the core function of the service.

oneOf.description: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning related technologies.
Data processing, analytics, and visualization capabilities.
Business and productivity applications and services.
Virtual, containerized, serverless, or high-performance computing infrastructure and services.
Database platforms and services that allow for storage and querying of data.
Software development and delivery tools and services.
Support for interworking of multiple cloud and/or on-premises environments.
Services that allow applications to interact with one another.
Development and management of IoT devices and networks.
Management, logging, and observability of a customer's use of cloud.
Media and entertainment streaming and processing services.
Moving applications and data to the cloud.
Services enabling cloud applications to interact via mobile technologies.
Storage services for structured or unstructured data.
Services enabling cloud applications to interact via the Internet.
New or emerging services that do not align with an existing category.
